= varPrintAttr =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [Syntax ] > [varPrintAttrMethod varPrintAttr]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$attr* _String_
  Target attribute name.
 * *$varName* _String_
  Variable avaible in scope of type Array or Object.  $varName should NOT start with $.


Prints variable $varName as attribute $attr of matched elements.
